short_summary: Request for Proposal for Real Estate Brokerage Services for the Embassy of Canada to Guatemala
description: The purpose of this RFP is to select a supplier to provide seller representation real estate brokerage services to sell/dispose the 5th Floor of a building and 24 associated parking units in Guatemala City, Guatemala.",
full_summary: Tender Announcement Notice ============================= ### Real Estate Brokerage Services for the Embassy of Canada to Guatemala #### Tender Reference Number: `cb-945-97525818` #### Solicitation Number: `24-260388` This is a request for proposal (RFP) by the Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) to enter into a contract with a supplier to provide real estate brokerage services for the Embassy of Canada in Guatemala City, Guatemala. **Objective** ------------ The objective of this RFP is to select a qualified supplier to represent the Department in the sale and disposal of a property consisting of the 5th floor and 24 associated parking units in Guatemala City. **Background** ------------- The Embassy requires real estate brokerage services to sell the aforementioned property. The selected supplier will be responsible for managing the sales process, ensuring compliance with all relevant laws and regulations, and overseeing the sale's execution. **Requirements** --------------- **Scope of Work** * Manage the sale and disposal of the property, including listing, marketing, and showings * Conduct negotiations with interested buyers and/or owner-occupiers * Consult with the Embassy's representatives as needed to address questions, concerns, and issues arising during the sales process * Ensure compliance with all applicable laws, regulations, and policies * Provide recommendations for the best course of action to maximize the property's value and proceeds **Contract Terms** * The contract will be awarded to the supplier with the lowest cost-per-point, as determined by a detailed evaluation of the proposals * The contract will commence on August 1, 2024, and is expected to conclude on March 31, 2026 **Submission Guidelines** --------------------------- All interested suppliers must submit their proposals in writing, according to the procedures outlined in the RFP documents. The deadline for submission is July 30, 2024, at 2:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time (EDT). **Contact Information** ------------------------- For further information, please contact Brent Hygaard at [Realproperty-contracts@international.gc.ca](mailto:Realproperty-contracts@international.gc.ca) or +1 (343) 573-5245. **Attachments** --------------- RFP documents, including the RFP questionnaire and Addendum 1, are available for download from the Canada Buys website: (
